UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationships of the intramolecular disulfide bonds in coprisin, a defensin from the dung beetle.
Literature.Author: Lee J, Lee DG, Choi H, Kim HH, Kim H, Hwang JS, Kim JI, Lee D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=30µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=7.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=7.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=7.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=7.5µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=7.5µM),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=3.8µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=30µM),Enterococcus faecium VR(MIC=15µM),Enterococcus faecalis VR(MIC=30µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=7.5µM)
